title: Abadar's Truthtelling
description: As zone of truth, but others know the target is affected by the spell.

title: Bless
description: Allies gain +1 on attack rolls and saves against fear.

title: Blessing of the Watch
description: Like bless, except it lasts 1 hour per level instead of 1 minute per level and only working in the caster’s home city, specifically referring to areas under the jurisdiction of the city watch.

title: Bless Water
description: Makes holy water.

title: Bless Weapon
description: Weapon strikes true against evil foes.

title: Bowstaff
description: A shortbow may double as a club, or a longbow as a quarterstaff.

title: Challenge Evil
description: Sickens creature if it refuses to fight you.

title: Compel Hostility
description: Compels opponents to attack you instead of your allies.

title: Create Water
description: Creates 2 gallons/level of pure water.

title: Cure Light Wounds
description: Cures 1d8 damage + 1/level (max +5).

title: Deadeye's Arrow
description: You create an arrow made of crackling electricity, which you may fire as a weapon or use as a glowing beacon.

title: Detect Charm
description: As detect magic, except vs. charms, compulsions, and possession auras.

title: Detect Poison
description: Detects poison in one creature or small object.

title: Detect the Faithful
description: You can detect other worshipers of your deity.

title: Detect Undead
description: Reveals undead within 60 ft.

title: Diagnose Disease
description: Detect and identify diseases.

title: Divine Favor
description: You gain +1 per three levels on attack and damage rolls.

title: Endure Elements
description: Exist comfortably in hot or cold regions.

title: Ghostbane Dirge
description: Incorporeal creature takes half damage from nonmagical weapons.

title: Grace
description: Movement doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity.

title: Hero's Defiance
description: Allows the use of lay on hands while falling unconscious.

title: Honeyed Tongue
description: Roll 2 dice when using Diplomacy, take higher roll.

title: Horn of Pursuit
description: Create three notes heard miles away.

title: Knight's Calling
description: Forces target to move toward you and fight you.

title: Know the Enemy
description: Gain +10 on a monster Knowledge check.

title: Liberating Command
description: Target makes an Escape Artist check as an immediate action and gains a bonus on it.

title: Litany of Sloth
description: Single target cannot make attacks of opportunity for 1 round.

title: Longshot
description: Grants a +10-foot bonus to the range increment for any ranged weapon fired.

title: Magic Weapon
description: Weapon gains +1 bonus.

title: Protection from Chaos/Evil
description: +2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignment.

title: Rally Point
description: Square gives good creatures bonuses.

title: Read Magic
description: Read scrolls and spellbooks.

title: Resistance
description: Subject gains +1 on saving throws.

title: Restoration, Lesser
description: Dispels magical ability penalty or repairs 1d4 ability damage.

title: Sanctify Corpse
description: Prevent a corpse from becoming an undead.

title: Sun Metal
description: Weapon touched bursts into flames.

title: Tactical Acumen
description: You gain an additional +1 on attack rolls or to AC due to battlefield positioning.

title: Unbreakable Heart
description: Target gains a +4 bonus on saves against mind-affecting effects that rely on negative emotions.

title: Veil of Positive Energy
description: +2 AC, +2 on saves vs. undead.

title: Virtue
description: Subject gains 1 temporary hp.

title: Wartrain Mount
description: Animal gains the combat training general purpose.

title: Word of Resolve
description: Ally rerolls a save against charm or fear.

title: Arrow of Law
description: Harm and possibly daze chaotic creatures.

title: Aura of Greater Courage
description: Increases strength of a paladin’s aura of courage.

title: Bestow Grace
description: Subject gains bonus on saving throws equal to Cha modifier.

title: Bestow Weapon Proficiency
description: Grants a creature proficiency in a single weapon for short period of time.

title: Blessing of Courage and Life
description: Grants a +2 bonus on saves vs. fear and death.

title: Bull's Strength
description: Subject gains +4 to Str for 1 min./level.

title: Corruption Resistance
description: Protects creature against damage from alignment-based attacks.

title: Delay Poison
description: Stops poison from harming subject for 1 hour/level.

title: Divine Arrow
description: Imbues a projectile with holy energy.

title: Eagle's Splendor
description: Subject gains +4 to Cha for 1 min./level.

title: Effortless Armor
description: Armor you wear no longer slows your speed.

title: Endure Elements, Communal
description: As endure elements, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Fire of Entanglement
description: Your ability to smite evil also entangles your foe.

title: Holy Shield
description: Lend your shield's protection to another.

title: Instant Armor
description: Summon armor temporarily replacing your current attire.

title: Light Lance
description: Creates a soaring beacon of light.

title: Litany of Defense
description: Doubles armor’s enhancement bonus.

title: Litany of Eloquence
description: Fascinates a single creature for 1 round.

title: Litany of Entanglement
description: Entangles a creature for 1 round.

title: Litany of Righteousness
description: A single evil creature takes more damage from creatures with a good aura.

title: Litany of Warding
description: You gain two additional attacks of opportunity for 1 round.

title: Magic Siege Engine
description: Siege engine gains +1 on targeting and damage rolls.

title: Owl's Wisdom
description: Subject gains +4 to Wis for 1 min./level.

title: Paladin's Sacrifice
description: Take the damage and effects for another creature.

title: Protection from Chaos, Communal
description: As protection from chaos, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Protection from Evil, Communal
description: As protection from evil, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Protection from Good, Communal
description: As protection from good, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Protection from Law, Communal
description: As protection from law, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Remove Paralysis
description: Frees one or more creatures from paralysis or slow effect.

title: Righteous Vigor
description: Boosts attack bonus with each hit.

title: Resist Energy
description: Ignores 10 or more points of damage per attack from specified energy type.

title: Sacred Bond
description: Cast touch healing spells from a distance.

title: Saddle Surge
description: Bonus damage for moving on mount.

title: Shield Other
description: You take half of subject's damage.

title: Soothing Word
description: Reduces effects of multiple conditions on target.

title: Undetectable Alignment
description: Conceals alignment from magical detection for 24 hours.

title: Vestment of the Champion
description: Armor or shield gains a +1 enhancement per four levels.

title: Wake of Light
description: Magical trail aids good creatures, hinders evil ones.

title: Weapon of Awe
description: Weapon gets +2 on damage rolls.

title: Zone of Truth
description: Subjects within range cannot lie.

title: Archon's Aura
description: Aura penalizes enemy attacks and AC.

title: Blade of Bright Victory
description: Bonded weapon gains ghost touch.

title: Blessing of the Mole
description: 1 ally/level gains darkvision and a +2 Stealth bonus.

title: Burst of Speed
description: You gain increased speed, and your movement ignores attacks of opportunity and allows you to move through the space of creatures larger than you are.

title: Cure Moderate Wounds
description: Cures 2d8 damage +1/level (max. +10).

title: Daybreak Arrow
description: Targeted ammunition exudes radiant energy.

title: Daylight
description: 60-ft. radius of bright light.

title: Deadly Juggernaut
description: Your might increases with every kill you make.

title: Delay Poison, Communal
description: As delay poison, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Discern Lies
description: Reveals deliberate falsehoods.

title: Dispel Magic
description: Cancels one magical spell or effect.

title: Divine Transfer
description: Transfer hit points and give DR/evil to target creature.

title: Fire of Judgment
description: Smited creature takes damage when it attacks.

title: Ghostbane Dirge, Mass
description: As ghostbane dirge, but affects multiple creatures.

title: Heal Mount
description: As heal on horse or other special mount.

title: Heroic Fortune
description: The target gains 1 temporary hero point.

title: Holy Whisper
description: Whisper sickens evil creatures, gives good creatures bonuses.

title: Litany of Escape
description: Teleports a friend out of a grapple.

title: Litany of Sight
description: You can see invisible creatures and objects within 30 feet of you.

title: Magic Circle against Chaos/Evil
description: As protection from chaos/evil, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

title: Magic Weapon, Greater
description: Weapon gains +1 bonus/four levels (max +5).

title: Marks of Forbiddance
description: Makes 2 creatures pass Will saves in order to attack each other.

title: Prayer
description: Allies get +1 bonus on most rolls, enemies –1 penalty.

title: Remove Blindness/Deafness
description: Cures normal or magical blindness or deafness.

title: Remove Curse
description: Frees object or person from curse.

title: Resist Energy, Communal
description: As resist energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Sanctify Armor
description: +1 AC/four levels (max +5).

title: Wrathful Mantle
description: Subject shines and gets +1/four levels on all saves.

title: Bestow Grace of the Champion
description: Target gains paladin abilities for 1 round/level.

title: Blaze of Glory
description: Last stand cures good creatures, hurts evil.

title: Break Enchantment
description: Frees subjects from enchantments, transmutations, and curses.

title: Bloodsworn Retribution
description: Cut yourself and swear an oath of retribution on your own blood gaining bonuses based on how much you injure yourself.

title: Burst of Glory
description: Targets in the area gain a +1 sacred bonus on attack rolls and saves against fear effects, plus 1 temporary hit point percaster level (maximum +20).

title: Cure Serious Wounds
description: Cures 3d8 damage + 1/level (max +15).

title: Death Ward
description: Grants bonuses against death spells and negative energy.

title: Dispel Chaos
description: +4 bonus against attacks by chaotic creatures.

title: Dispel Evil
description: +4 bonus against attacks by evil creatures.

title: Fire of Vengeance
description: Smited creature takes 3d8 damage.

title: Forced Repentance
description: Target falls prone and confesses sins.

title: Holy Sword
description: Weapon becomes +5, deals +2d6 damage against evil.

title: King’s Castle
description: Instantly switch places with a single ally.

title: Litany of Thunder
description: A single target is deafened until the condition is removed, and is confused for 1 round.

title: Litany of Vengeance
description: Allies attacking the target of the spell gain a +5 bonus on damage rolls for 1 round.

title: Magic Siege Engine, Greater
description: Siege engine gains +1 on targeting and damage rolls for every four caster levels.

title: Mark of Justice
description: Designates action that triggers curse on subject.

title: Neutralize Poison
description: Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.

title: Oath of Peace
description: Grants +5 AC and DR 10/evil, can’t attack.

title: Raise Animal Companion
description: As raise dead, but on an animal.

title: Reprobation
description: Marked target is shunned by your religion.

title: Resounding Blow
description: Melee attack deals 1d6 more damage.

title: Restoration
description: Restores level and ability score drains.

title: Sacrificial Oath
description: Take damage for an ally for many rounds.

title: Shield of the Dawnflower
description: Creatures that strike you take 1d6 +1/level fire damage.

title: Stay the Hand
description: Subject cannot attack with melee weapon.

title: Symbol of Healing
description: Triggered rune heals living creatures.
